title: I’m Daring YouTube To Kick Me Off YouTube For This (Ep 1411)
description:
In this episode, I dare the tyrants at YouTube to kick me off their platform for covering alleged election fraud. I also cover the stunning lawsuit out of Texas which could upend the 2020 election. Finally, I discuss the pending collapse of this major American city, and the obvious reason why. 

News Picks:


Eight more states join the Texas lawsuit.

There is a remedy for the election malfeasance. Here it is.

Are “science” journals going “woke”?


Lara Trump doesn’t rule out a run for US Senate in North Carolina.


Questions persist over suspicious vote counting, caught on tape, in Georgia.

The stunning lawsuit out of Texas could change everything. 


What’s going on in Los Angeles should frighten everyone. 

If Biden wins the election, his pick for HHS would be a disaster.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
